definition.value: KaadNkitahodi
Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wonya API Credentials a, yɛsrɛ wo kɔ https://cardconnect.com/signup/developer
Aguadifo ID
API Ɔdefoɔ Edin
API Asɛmfua a Wɔde Di Dwuma

Logging:
Log fael no wɔ system/logs/cardconnect.txt fael no mu
Sɔhwɛ
Sɔ Nkitahodi hwɛ
Nya Sɔhwɛ API Credentials
Sɔhwɛ Mode

Domain portion to API:
Ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔsesa saa botae yi, gye sɛ ɛsono sɛnea cardConnent akyerɛ.
Nkitahodi no ayɛ yiye na wɔahyehyɛ API Credentials no yiye.
Mmeae a Ɛwɔ Hɔ Nyinaa
Beaeɛ

Refunded:
Order status a wopɛ sɛ wɔde si hɔ sɛ wɔsan tua no wɔ admin/order mu a

Pow:
Order tebea a wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛw wɔ abakɔsɛm mu de bua payment processor tebea. Main order tebea no nnya nkɛntɛnso. Ɛnyɛ bere a wɔatua no yiye akyi nkutoo na wɔrenkra.

Success & not settled:
Paw main order tebea a wopɛ sɛ wode si hɔ de bua payment processor tebea

Success & settled:
Paw main order tebea a wopɛ sɛ wode si hɔ de bua payment processor tebea

Voided:
Order status a wopɛ sɛ wɔde si hɔ sɛ payment no voided wɔ admin/order mu a.
Auto (ma tumi na kyere) .
Wɔakyɛ (wɔma ho kwan nkutoo) .

Settlement type:
Sɛ wɔde to "auto" so a, ɛnde wɔde asɛm no bɛka nnɛyi settlement no ho. Sɛ wɔde si hɔ sɛ 'delayed' a, ɛnde wɔbɛma asɛm no ho kwan nanso wɔrensiesie(wɔnkyere). Ɛsɛ sɛ wode nsa kyere nnwuma wɔ nnafua 7 akyi wɔ tumi krataa akyi

Max credit cards saved:
Fa credit card dodow a ɛsen biara a adetɔfo besie (ɛkɔ 100) si hɔ. Sɛ wɔde si 0 anaasɛ blank saving of cards remma kwan. Ahobanbɔ ho nsɛm: Wɔde adetɔfoɔ credit card ho nsɛm sie wɔ CardConnect secure servers so na ama wɔahwɛ ahu sɛ wɔbɛyɛ data ahobanbɔ ho nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛkyɛn so. Wɔrenkora credit card ho nsɛm biara so wɔ wo wɛbsaet no so.
Da a Wɔde Di Dwuma
Sika
Wɔfaa sika yiye
Capture dii nkonim, order status updated to nkonimdie - settled
Wɔyɛɛ sika a wɔde bɛsan ama no ho adwuma yiye
Refund no dii nkonim, order status updated to refunded
Void dii nkonim, wɔyɛɛ order tebea no foforo kɔɔ voided
Katua ho Nsɛm
Wɔakyere sikatua
Wɔagyae sikatua no
Wɔasan de sika a wotua no ama
Nkyeremu Dodow
Sika a Wɔde Sane
CardConnect Charge ID a wɔde tua ho ka
Sika dodow a wɔama ho kwan nyinaa
Sika a wɔde bɛka ho
Nkitahodi a Wɔsan de Sika Ma
Yɛsrɛ sɛ si so dua sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopopa sikatua no?
Yɛsrɛ wo si so dua sɛ wopɛ sɛ wokyere sikatua no?
Yɛsrɛ sɛ si so dua sɛ wopɛ sɛ wosan tua sika no?
San tua bra
Hunu
Kyere
Mfomso a ɛwɔ mu. Hwɛ mfomso log anaa input parameters!
Yɛsrɛ sɛ kyerɛw sika a ɛyɛ papa
Entumi nsɛe asɛm no, nsiesie na nhwɛ asɛm no ho nsɛm
Entumi nkyere, nsiesie asɛm no ho nsɛm na hwɛ sika dodow a wɔkyeree
Wontumi nsan mfa sika mma, nsiesie asɛm no ho nsɛm na nhwɛ sika a wɔde bɛsan ama no
Mprempren Settlement Gyinabea
